name: Heavy Light
description:
Heavy Light is a short atmospheric 2.5D platformer game. You play as an underground creature who finds a way to reach the surface of the earth, for the first time, through an abandoned mine.

Controls:
Use 'A' and 'D' to move,
'E' to use,
'Space' to jump/ascend,
and 'Escape' to toggle the menu
